3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled in the coveted Westwood Park neighborhood, this exquisite residence showcases an alluring floorplan, an abundance of natural light, and a captivating backyard. Prepare to be enchanted by the allure of 21 Ridgewood, where you'll find two bedrooms, a luxurious full bathroom, a graceful living room, an elegant formal dining room, remodeled chef's kitchen, and an expansive lower level teeming with untapped potential. Commuting is a breeze with seamless access to major routes like 280 and 101, as well as convenient options like Bart and Muni. Enjoy the convenience of nearby Glen Park Village, offering a delightful array of shopping and dining options, while also relishing in the proximity to outdoor havens like Glen Park Canyon. Plus, indulge in the ease of having Whole Foods on Ocean Ave. just moments away, making everyday errands a breeze.
Confidential Remarks: Offers welcome Thursday 7/13 @ 2:00pm. Email fulfordgroup@sothebyshomes.com for ALL showing requests. No text Messages or Showing Time. www.21ridgewood.com Escrow opened with Kevin Thompson of First American. Buyer to satisfy themselves with sqft measurements and parking. Please use most current SFAR Purchase Contract, allow 24 hours to respond, include fully executed disclosure package, and 1 business day for the initial deposit.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Westwood Highlands is one of the most desirable San Francisco neighborhoods. Built in 1925 this detached home has beautiful period details and expansive views of the southern hills, ocean & bay. The main floor is filled with light from numerous large windows and features hardwood floors, gorgeous moulding and wainscoting. The living room features large windows and a fireplace with period tile and built-in surround. The dining room has a classic built-in buffet. The large remodeled eat-in kitchen has plentiful cabinet and counter space. There are two bedrooms on main level with views from bay to ocean and full bath. One has extensive built in shelving and has been used as a home office. The larger bedroom with a large closet and views could be a lovely primary bedroom. The lower level has a primary suite and a spacious family room leading to the large deck and stairway to the back garden, laundry room with a half bath, utility room, and large one-car garage. From the deck you can enjoy the view in the afternoon sun protected by the windscreen. This home has been lovingly cared for by the sellers and the two previous owners. Improvements range from new windows to seismic upgrades. Co

Confidential Remarks: Multiple offers received. Staged! Shows Well! Email me at PatrickSOLD@gmail.com for disclosures. Please email questions & offers to PatrickSOLD@gmail.com. Seller reserves the right to accept, counter or reject any or all offers.
Public Remarks: Experience modern and luxurious living in the highly sought-after Sherwood Forest neighborhood! Got the amazing views to Sutro Tower, Mount Davidson Cross & Ocean. This captivating fully-attached residence spans 3-levels, boasting 2,009 SQFT with 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, including a stunning en-suite and walk-in closet. Recently undergoing a complete renovation, including new electrical and plumbing all fully permitted resulting in an extraordinary transformation. Beyond its contemporary facade, you'll find beautiful white oak hardwood flooring and an abundance of natural light that fills the home's open and airy layout. The top level features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, including the master suite, walk-in closet, and solatube skylights. The middle level offers a sun-drenched living room with cozy fireplace, dining area, half bathroom and kitchen adorned with custom-made cabinets, Quartz countertops, stainless appliances, and easy access through French doors to a nice enclosed solarium and decks for family gatherings and relaxation. The lower level features a wine cellar, along with a notable two-car side-by-side parking with ample storage space and high ceilings. This remarkable home located in a quiet cul-de-sec is a must-see.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This fully detached mid-century home in peaceful Sherwood Forest boasts many updates, a stellar social layout, and considerable privacy. The large great room features room to dine, relax, and cook, plus hardwood floors, recessed lighting, and speakers. Skylit kitchen w/ large island, deluxe appliances including hooded Wolf range and wine cooler, and ample cabinets. Highly desirable floor plan has all three bedrooms on this level. Sunny primary suite w/ backyard outlook and luxe bathroom w/ dual sink vanity. Second and third bedrooms include closets w/ custom organizers, and large windows. Renovated hall bath w/ large cabinets plus coat, linen, and utility closets complete this level. Internal stairs lead down to XL family room w/ large nook great for WFH, flexible bonus room, and laundry room w/ storage. Potential to reconfigure lower level w/ additional bedroom suite. Family room opens to terraced backyard w/ mature perimeter landscaping, ocean views & succulent gardens. Spacious two-car garage w/ even more storage. Amazing tranquil location less than 200 feet from entrance to Mt Davidson Park - open space oasis with great trails and views from the city's highest natural point. Sh

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Charming detached Westwood Park home was remodeled and beautifully expanded in 2021. The wood details, built-ins and beveled glass library doors greet you upon entering the gracious foyer with coat closet. Opening onto the living room with picture window, ceramic tile fireplace surround and built-in cabinet. The dining room has a large built-in sideboard and opens to the bright & cheerful updated kitchen with quartz counters and stainless appliances. There are 3 spacious bedrooms on this floor, 2 which overlook the yard, and bathroom with deep tub. The new staircase down to the amazing lower floor, is a dramatic entry to 2 additional bedrooms, a den/office, new bathroom and a great family room with a built-in unit. Entry to both the landscaped yard & the garage with additional cars on the driveway. There are hardwood floors throughout and beautiful era detail wood work. Both the floorplan and flow of rooms is a real pleasure, including all the structural and system upgrades done with permit. Westwood Park was a planned residential Park, well located between Sunnyside & Balboa Terrace, close to Glen Park shops&restaurants & Bart to the East & NW to West Portal.
Confidential Remarks: All offers on SFAR contract with preapproval letter and signed disclosure package and proof of funds if all cash. Please use Fidelity National Title for escrow with Paula Siegel which is listed in the disclosure package.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on a lovely tree-lined street in the sought-after Monterey Heights, this bright, elegant, and meticulously renovated Spanish Mediterranean fully detached home features 4-bedrooms, 3.5-bathrooms and sweeping ocean views from every level. Enter the home through the inviting front garden and into a magnificent living room with a stately fireplace, original crown moldings, coved ceilings and huge picture windows that lead to the deck & amazing views of Lake Merced & the Pacific Ocean. Adjacent to the living room is the formal dining room, remodeled gourmet kitchen and half bath. 3 bedrooms and 2 baths are on the upper level including the master suite with jaw dropping views. The lowermost level is an incredible flex space with endless opportunities from a guest quarters to a teenagers dream and includes 1 bedroom, 1 full bathroom, kitchenette, office, family room, laundry area, 100+ bottle wine cellar and access to rear patio and the 1+ car garage. Ideally located in Monterey Heights, adjacent to St. Francis Wood; few minutes to the charming shops and restaurants on West Portal, the underground Muni train, for a car-free commute to the rest of the city and easy 101/280 freeway access.
Confidential Remarks: Tax records state 3,100 sq. ft. Open Homes draftsperson measured 3,673 sq. ft.

Public Remarks: Located in the hills of the sought after Westwood Highlands enclave, this charming 1920s Spanish style home sits on a beautiful corner lot with private driveway and abundant street parking. It offers a true unique living experience with large picture windows all around that provide spectacular views of the bay and flow of sunlight. With a split level floor plan, this elegant home boasts two living areas, oversized bedrooms, a movie theater and tons of storage. Whether its from the two custom fireplaces, sophisticated crown moldings, solid oak hardwood floors with classical inlay design, or the retro inspired pastel bathrooms with subway tile, you understand you are now living in one of the best parts of San Francisco. Modern upgrades include granite slab countertops, top-of-the-line appliances, new light fixtures, electric EV car charging, fresh paint inside & out. Enjoy pleasant walks to St. Francis Wood & Monterey Heights, and proximity to popular West Portal and highways 101 & 280.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Magnificent French Mediterranean sweeping Bay view home proudly situated on wonderful tree-lined block! Lovely garden leads to classic portico entry & into an impressive lobby-like greeting hall w/coat closet. Spectacular formal living rm boasts an imposing fireplace w/handsome tile surround & mantel, expansive recessed five panel picture window, exquisite wall sconces, intricate plaster moldings & gleaming parquet hardwood floors. Grand banquet-size formal dining rm w/enormous bay window, sweeping East Bay & water views, striking chandelier & terrific walk-out deck! Delightful updated kitchen w/great breakfast rm & original built-in china hutch showcases all stainless steel appliances incl a Forno six-burner gas range, Carrara quartz counters, painted wood cabinets & nice pantry closet. A pleasant home office w/charming walk-out deck, half bath & spacious mudroom end this level. A splendid wrought-iron open-banister staircase ascends to the upper level w/3BR/2BA on same floor! Incredible master suite w/huge walk-in closet enjoys a big sitting/dressing rm & a private full bath. Lower level includes a guest quarters w/private entrance, laundry area & enormous workroom. 2 sep parking garages. Fabulous landscaped backyard w/tradesman's entrance, garden, lush lawn & multiple patios!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Charming 'Swiss Chalet' Pacific Ocean view home nestled in the hills on a wonderful block! Lovely garden entrance w/inviting walkway & terrazzo staircase leads to a classic vestibule & into a terrific foyer w/coat closet. Magnificent formal living rm w/open-beam ceiling boasts a fireplace w/exquisite original mantel & tile surround, arched doorways, gleaming parquet hardwood floors & large picture windows w/stunning views from the Bay to the the Olympic Club & Pacific Ocean. Beautiful park-like landscaped backyard w/views, covered deck, lawn, colorful mature plants & trees!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Ideally located in a prime location of Westwood Park, this fully detached fabulous home showcases a perfect blend of period details and modern updates. Step inside and be captivated by the spaciousness of the home and the abundance of natural light. An open living area, elegant hardwood floors, wood burning fireplace, and formal dining room add to the charm. The modern kitchen is equipped with a gas range, ample cabinet space, and a flexible space that can be used as a cozy dining area or as a light filled office space. Two spacious bedrooms, one large full bath, and an additional half bath complete the main floor. Both bedrooms have direct access to a sun-drenched patio and Zen like garden. An extremely large garage offers parking for two cars, a workspace with built in shelving, and storage galore. An additional bonus is the easy access to shops, restaurants, cafes, Bart, Muni, and both 280 and 101. This is truly a must-see home!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step into the charm of this recently updated Westwood Park classic. This beautiful home has been lovingly maintained by the same family for over 50 years and it truly embodies the elegance of the era. A formal entry welcomes you with craftsman-inspired details and original features that have been seamlessly blended with modern touches. The light-filled living room is graced by a woodburning fireplace, with French doors that open to a small balcony. The formal dining room with a built-in buffet is the perfect setting for gatherings and entertainment. The kitchen has been updated with quartz countertops and hardwood flooring and features a dedicated casual dining area. The spacious rear yard provides a perfect oasis where you can unwind and entertain guests. This home offers both beauty and functionality, with hardwood flooring and quartz finishes, and amenities that include a laundry room, mud room, basement, large patio, garden, and a garage with a deep driveway easily accommodating additional parking. Set on the best block in Westwood Park, this home promises unparalleled privacy and serenity on its quiet tree-lined street. West Portal & Glen Park are both nearby, with many dining & shopping options along Ocean Ave. Easy access to freeways as well as MUNI and BART stations.
Confidential Remarks: For showing requests, please contact Paul Warrin 415.407.8019 (paul@aw-sf.com) or Holly Khouw 415.444.6403 (holly@aw-sf.com).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Fully detached, rarely available Westwood Highlands gem in absolute move-in condition with many upgrades throughout! Newly painted exterior and located on a beautiful block with many original details intact including gumwood and parquet floors with wood inlay, truly special. The main level has a living room with cathedral ceilings and a wood burning fireplace connecting to a formal dining room with beautiful paneling and a built-in buffet. The lower level of the home is very large (expansion potential?) including a laundry & storage area and one-car garage - additional parking in the driveway! Direct access to the enchanting garden with lush vegetation from this level. Westwood Highlands is a very desirable neighborhood with easy access to 101 and 280 - West Portal is in walking distance. Come & see for yourself, opportunity!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Darryl Chew - Agt: 925-899-6061 - Panoramic Views. Charming Spanish Mediterranean Home – Views of hills, ocean and SF bay. Spacious and versatile office or guest room options! Featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms. This unique home layout has 3 levels. MAIN STREET Entry includes 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with a jacuzzi tub and shower, a vaulted ceiling living room warmed by a wood burning fireplace, a formal dining room, and a charming chef’s Viking stove kitchen and dining area w/ an attached glass sun room enclosure opening to decking with spectacular views. LOWER SECOND level offers another 1 bedroom and 1 bath, a large family room, wood burning fire place, built in shelving and a cozy greenhouse view room. The one bedroom can be a guest bedroom or office which has a walk-in closet and a separate entrance to the outdoor stairway. The LOWER THIRD ground floor level has a 1 bedroom or office option with a full bathroom, a walk-in closet and storage room. Additional home features include hardwood parquet flooring, recessed lighting, sconces, built-ins, garage parking, and laundry room. Nestled in privacy with beautiful mature and new landscaping. A perfect home for those who work from home and while enjoying privacy and breathtaking views.

Public Remarks: Panoramic Views. Charming Spanish Mediterranean Home – Views of hills, ocean and SF bay. Spacious and versatile office or guest room options! Featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms. This unique home layout has 3 levels. MAIN STREET Entry includes 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with a jacuzzi tub and shower, a vaulted ceiling living room warmed by a wood burning fireplace, a formal dining room, and a charming chef’s Viking stove kitchen and dining area w/ an attached glass sun room enclosure opening to decking with spectacular views. LOWER SECOND level offers another 1 bedroom and 1 bath, a large family room, wood burning fire place, built in shelving and a cozy greenhouse view room. The one bedroom can be a guest bedroom or office which has a walk-in closet and a separate entrance to the outdoor stairway. The LOWER THIRD ground floor level has a 1 bedroom or office option with a full bathroom, a walk-in closet and storage room. Additional home features include hardwood parquet flooring, recessed lighting, sconces, built-ins, garage parking, and laundry room. Nestled in privacy with beautiful mature and new landscaping. A perfect home for those who work from home and while enjoying privacy and breathtaking views.
Sale COOP: LA & BA same company different office
Showing Instruction: Vacant on Supra lockbox. Front door.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step into this gorgeous detached 1926 Tudor-style home on a beautiful block in Westwood Highlands. The Sophisticated home is warm and inviting, with charming period detail and modern amenities. The main level has a living room with cathedral ceilings and a wood-burning fireplace with arts and crafts tile surround, two generous-sized bedrooms with some views, a full bath, a formal dining room with a buffet, a kitchen with stainless appliances, granite countertops, and a banquette breakfast area. The abundance of windows lets in natural light. There was a major remodel of the kitchen and bath on the main level and the development of the lower level with two bedrooms, one bath, and a family room with French doors that open to the garden. Additional architectural features include Parquet floors with wood inlay and tall ceilings. There is a laundry room, storage, and a one-car garage with additional parking in the driveway. Easy access to 101 and 280 and the 43-bus line. Nice walk to West Portal or Glen Park. Very Pretty Neighborhood!
Confidential Remarks: Pre-escrow opened with Joanne Kung with Chicago Title Company. To request a Disclosure Package, please email mimi.bruce@compass.com or text me at 415.279.6962. A lockbox is installed on the side door to the left of the property. Please call me regarding offers.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on a large corner landscaped lot, this grand fully detached Westwood Park home benefits from large scale, modern updates and tons of natural light. Consisting of 4 bedrooms (3 on the main level) and 3 and 1/2 baths, this wonderful home has the floor plan that is so desired. A formal entry leads to both the spacious living room with wood burning fireplace and a formal dining room big enough for a large family dinner. A remodeled kitchen with eating area, generous storage, and high-end stainless steel appliances would not disappoint any chef. 3 big bedrooms, each with great light , including an ensuite primary are just down the hall. A second bathroom completes this floor. The recently developed and permitted lower floor has a huge family room and office area. This massive room can accommodate friends and family and still have extra space for an office, play area and half bath. In addition, this level provides a 2nd primary with a huge closet and a remodeled luxurious bathroom. Some of the many features that make this home spectacular include, a 2 car garage, large patio and garden, hardwood floors throughout, laundry room and an almost 4000 sqft corner lot. When you combine these with the spectacular location, it is easy to see why this home is so terrific.
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show by appointment. For showings or disclosures please email: team@cityrealestatesf.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Charming Westwood Park fully detached single-family home with cottage! This is an amazing opportunity to purchase a delightful 2+ bedroom / 1 bath home with a bonus 1 bedroom, 1 bath cottage. A lovely front porch welcomes you to the entry of this Craftsman style home. From here a traditional fireplace, enhanced with a cast iron log burning insert, serves as the focal point of the large, open plan living and dining room. Abundant light fills the home through plantation shutters, showcasing the beautiful, newly refinished oak floors. The retro-style kitchen is well designed with ample wooden cabinetry, a stove top, built-in oven, and breakfast nook. A short flight of stairs takes you to the bedroom level where two spacious bedrooms overlook the rear yard. The adjacent sunroom, with a built-in closet system, has previously been used as a third bedroom or makes a great home office. The undeveloped garage level may offer opportunity for expansion with good ceiling height. Out back, the well-maintained rear yard offers access to the 1 bedroom cottage. This wonderful bonus includes a rear deck - so many options for this versatile space!
Confidential Remarks: For more information and showing requests, please contact Mark Brown at 415-359-5576 / mark@brownsf.com

Public Remarks: Listing Price Adjustment on this Wonderfully updated home in the Westwood Park neighborhood of San Francisco. Be home for the holidays! Room for entertaining! This 2 Bedroom 1 Bath is on the market for the first time in 100 years. The amazing updates include the flooring throughout, kitchen updated throughout, bathroom, new roof, new windows in the living and dining rooms, and exterior and interior paint. The home offers great opportunities to add living space to the enormous garage. The large backyard offers the opportunity to create you private oasis. The beautiful views from the rear of the home round out this outstanding time to own a home in San Francisco. Close to public transportation, schools and freeways. An opportunity you do not want to miss!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Ideally located in Westwood Park, this storybook sun-filled fully detached home maintains its original detail w/ modern touches. The home offers sparkling hardwood floors, freshly painted interior/exterior, 2 spacious bedrooms w/ views & 1 updated bath on the main level, and a bonus bed/bath downstairs with direct access to a large patio and expansive landscaped garden offering a peaceful retreat & the opportunity to enjoy outdoor entertaining & activities. Enter the home through a formal foyer and arrive inside a spacious living room with gas fireplace flanked by built-in shelving. The adjacent formal dining room features a built-in credenza & new modern chandelier. The well-equipped chef's kitchen features a cozy b'fast nook, dining counter w/ seating for three, granite countertops, ample cabinetry, and a full suite of s/s appliances: Bertazzoni 5-burner gas range w/ hood above, oversized dual door refrigerator w/ built-in ice & water makers, Bosch dishwasher, and a built-in microwave. The kitchen provides direct access to the rear garden along w/ stairs leading down to the lower level. Add'l highlights: full-size w/d, storage galore, oversized garage w/ steel beams, ample space

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Fabulous Westwood Park home in very desirable location. Gorgeous living room with fireplace & beautiful hard wood floors. Classic formal dining room with built in cabinets. Wonderful big, remodeled kitchen. Lots of natural light from an abundance of windows. Two big bedrooms and tile full bath on main level. Panoramic view from the magnificent rear deck completes this well configured top level. Lower level boasts a big bedroom with garden view, & refreshment area (all lower level rooms are considered bonus rooms and there is no evidence that there are city permits for their construction or use). Huge garage with lofty ceilings. Expansive serene level garden. Great southern hill views. Washer/dryer & plenty of storage. Convenient location close to shopping, Freeway access, BART and schools. You will love this home and neighborhood forever.
